title: Gapless Andreev bound states in the quantum spin Hall insulator HgTe
title_cn: 量子自旋霍尔绝缘体HgTe中的无间隙Andreev束缚态
abstract: In recent years, Majorana physics has attracted considerable attention because of exotic new phenomena and its prospects for fault-tolerant topological quantum computation. To this end, one needs to engineer the interplay between superconductivity and electronic properties in a topological insulator, but experimental work remains scarce and ambiguous. Here, we report experimental evidence for topological superconductivity induced in a HgTe quantum well, a 2D topological insulator that exhibits the quantum spin Hall (QSH) effect. The a.c. Josephson effect demonstrates that the supercurrent has a 4π periodicity in the superconducting phase difference, as indicated by a doubling of the voltage step for multiple Shapiro steps. In addition, this response like that of a superconducting quantum interference device to a perpendicular magnetic field shows that the 4π-periodic supercurrent originates from states located on the edges of the junction. Both features appear strongest towards the QSH regime, and thus provide evidence for induced topological superconductivity in the QSH edge states.
abstract_cn: 近年来，由于奇异的新现象及其在容错拓扑量子计算中的应用前景，马约拉纳邦物理学引起了相当大的关注。为此，需要设计拓扑绝缘体中超导性和电子特性之间的相互作用，但是实验工作仍然稀缺且模棱两可。在这里，我们报告在HgTe量子阱中诱导的拓扑超导性的实验证据，该量子阱是一种展示量子自旋霍尔（QSH）效应的二维拓扑绝缘体。交流约瑟夫森效应证明超电流具有4＆＃960;超导相位差的周期性，如多个Shapiro阶跃的电压阶跃加倍所示。另外，类似于超导量子干涉装置对垂直磁场的这种响应表明，4周期超电流源自位于结边缘的状态。这两个特征在QSH体制下似乎最强，从而为QSH边缘态中诱导的拓扑超导提供了证据。

title: Valley- and spin-polarized Landau levels in monolayer WSe2
title_cn: 单层WSe2中的谷极化和自旋极化的朗道能级
abstract: Electrons in monolayer transition metal dichalcogenides are characterized by valley and spin quantum degrees of freedom, making it possible to explore new physical phenomena and to foresee novel applications in the fields of electronics and optoelectronics. Theoretical proposals further suggest that Berry curvature effects, together with strong spin–orbit interactions, can generate unconventional Landau levels (LLs) under a perpendicular magnetic field. In particular, these would support valley- and spin-polarized chiral edge states in the quantum Hall regime. However, this unique LL structure has not been observed experimentally in transition metal dichalcogenides. Here we report the observation of fully valley- and spin-polarized LLs in high-quality WSe2 monolayers achieved by exploiting a van der Waals heterostructure device platform. We applied handedness-resolved optical reflection spectroscopy to probe the inter-LL transitions at individual valleys and derived the LL structure in turn. We also measured a sizeable doping-induced mass renormalization driven by the strong Coulomb interactions.
abstract_cn: 单层过渡金属二硫化碳中的电子具有谷和自旋量子自由度的特征，从而有可能探索新的物理现象并预测在电子和光电子领域的新应用。理论上的建议进一步表明，贝里曲率效应与强自旋轨道相互作用一起，可以在垂直磁场下产生非常规的朗道能级（LLs）。特别地，这些将支持量子霍尔体系中的谷极化和自旋极化的手性边缘态。但是，这种独特的LL结构尚未在过渡金属二卤化物中实验观察到。在这里，我们报告了通过利用范德华异质结构器件平台实现的高质量WSe 2 单层中完全谷底和自旋极化LL的观察。我们应用了手持性分辨光学反射光谱技术来探测各个波谷之间的LL间跃迁，并依次推导LL结构。我们还测量了由强大的库仑相互作用驱动的大量掺杂引起的质量重正化。

title: Vectorial scanning force microscopy using a nanowire sensor
title_cn: 使用纳米线传感器的矢量扫描力显微镜
abstract: Self-assembled nanowire (NW) crystals can be grown into nearly defect-free nanomechanical resonators with exceptional properties, including small motional mass, high resonant frequency and low dissipation. Furthermore, by virtue of slight asymmetries in geometry, a NW's flexural modes are split into doublets oscillating along orthogonal axes. These characteristics make bottom-up grown NWs extremely sensitive vectorial force sensors. Here, taking advantage of its adaptability as a scanning probe, we use a single NW to image a sample surface. By monitoring the frequency shift and direction of oscillation of both modes as we scan above the surface, we construct a map of all spatial tip–sample force derivatives in the plane. Finally, we use the NW to image electric force fields distinguishing between forces arising from the NW charge and polarizability. This universally applicable technique enables a form of atomic force microscopy particularly suited to mapping the size and direction of weak tip–sample forces.
abstract_cn: 自组装的纳米线（NW）晶体可以成长为几乎无缺陷的纳米机械谐振器，具有优异的性能，包括较小的运动质量，较高的谐振频率和较低的耗散。此外，由于几何形状的不对称性，NW的挠曲模分裂为沿正交轴振荡的双峰。这些特征使自下而上生长的NW非常敏感，矢量力传感器。在这里，利用其作为扫描探针的适应性，我们使用单个NW对样品表面成像。通过监视在表面上方扫描时两种模式的频率偏移和振荡方向，我们构造了平面中所有空间尖端采样力导数的图。最后，我们使用NW对电场成像，以区分NW电荷和极化率所产生的力。这种普遍适用的技术使原子力显微镜成为一种特别适合绘制弱尖端样本力的大小和方向的方法。

title: A universal and ultrasensitive vectorial nanomechanical sensor for imaging 2D force fields
title_cn: 通用且超灵敏的矢量纳米机械传感器，用于二维力场成像
abstract: The miniaturization of force probes into nanomechanical oscillators enables ultrasensitive investigations of forces on dimensions smaller than their characteristic length scales. It also unravels the vectorial character of the force field and how its topology impacts the measurement. Here we present an ultrasensitive method for imaging two-dimensional vectorial force fields by optomechanically following the bidimensional Brownian motion of a singly clamped nanowire. This approach relies on angular and spectral tomography of its quasi-frequency-degenerated transverse mechanical polarizations: immersing the nanoresonator in a vectorial force field not only shifts its eigenfrequencies but also rotates the orientation of the eigenmodes, as a nanocompass. This universal method is employed to map a tunable electrostatic force field whose spatial gradients can even dominate the intrinsic nanowire properties. Enabling vectorial force field imaging with demonstrated sensitivities of attonewton variations over the nanoprobe Brownian trajectory will have a strong impact on scientific exploration at the nanoscale.
abstract_cn: 将力探头小型化为纳米机械振荡器可以对尺寸小于其特征长度尺度的力进行超灵敏的研究。它还揭示了力场的矢量特性及其拓扑如何影响测量。在这里，我们提出了一种超灵敏的方法，该方法通过光机械地跟随单钳位纳米线的二维布朗运动来成像二维矢量力场。这种方法依靠其准频率退化的横向机械极化的角度和光谱层析成像：将纳米谐振器浸入矢量力场中，不仅改变了其本征频率，而且还旋转了本征模的方向（作为纳米罗盘）。这种通用方法用于绘制可调谐的静电力场，该场的空间梯度甚至可以控制固有的纳米线特性。启用矢量力场成像，并在纳米探针布朗轨道上表现出attonewton变化的敏感性，将对纳米级的科学探索产生重大影响。

title: Evolutionary multi-objective optimization of colour pixels based on dielectric nanoantennas
title_cn: 基于介电纳米天线的彩色像素进化多目标优化
abstract: The rational design of photonic nanostructures consists of anticipating their optical response from systematic variations of simple models. This strategy, however, has limited success when multiple objectives are simultaneously targeted, because it requires demanding computational schemes. To this end, evolutionary algorithms can drive the morphology of a nano-object towards an optimum through several cycles of selection, mutation and cross-over, mimicking the process of natural selection. Here, we present a numerical technique that can allow the design of photonic nanostructures with optical properties optimized along several arbitrary objectives. In particular, we combine evolutionary multi-objective algorithms with frequency-domain electrodynamical simulations to optimize the design of colour pixels based on silicon nanostructures that resonate at two user-defined, polarization-dependent wavelengths. The scattering spectra of optimized pixels fabricated by electron-beam lithography show excellent agreement with the targeted objectives. The method is self-adaptive to arbitrary constraints and therefore particularly apt for the design of complex structures within predefined technological limits.
abstract_cn: 光子纳米结构的合理设计包括从简单模型的系统变化中预测它们的光学响应。但是，当同时指定多个目标时，此策略的成功有限，因为它需要苛刻的计算方案。为此，进化算法可以通过选择，突变和交叉的多个周期，将纳米对象的形态推向最佳状态，从而模仿自然选择的过程。在这里，我们提出了一种数值技术，可以使光子纳米结构的光学特性沿几个任意目标得到优化。特别是，我们将进化多目标算法与频域电动力学仿真相结合，以基于在两个用户定义的，偏振相关的波长共振的硅纳米结构，优化彩色像素的设计。通过电子束光刻制造的优化像素的散射光谱与目标物镜显示出极好的一致性。该方法自适应于任意约束，因此特别适合在预定技术范围内设计复杂结构。

title: Host–guest chemistry with water-soluble gold nanoparticle supraspheres
title_cn: 水溶性金纳米粒子超球体的主客体化学
abstract: The uptake of molecular guests, a hallmark of the supramolecular chemistry of cages and containers, has yet to be documented for soluble assemblies of metal nanoparticles. Here we demonstrate that gold nanoparticle-based supraspheres serve as a host for the hydrophobic uptake, transport and subsequent release of over two million organic guests, exceeding by five orders of magnitude the capacities of individual supramolecular cages or containers and rivalling those of zeolites and metal–organic frameworks on a mass-per-volume basis. The supraspheres are prepared in water by adding hexanethiol to polyoxometalate-protected 4 nm gold nanoparticles. Each 200 nm assembly contains hydrophobic cavities between the estimated 27,400 gold building blocks that are connected to one another by nanometre-sized pores. This gives a percolated network that effectively absorbs large numbers of molecules from water, including 600,000, 2,100,000 and 2,600,000 molecules (35, 190 and 234 g l−1) of para-dichorobenzene, bisphenol A and trinitrotoluene, respectively.
abstract_cn: 对于金属纳米粒子的可溶性组装，尚未记录到分子客体的摄取，这是笼子和容器的超分子化学的标志。在这里，我们证明了基于金纳米粒子的超球体是疏水吸收，运输和随后释放的超过200万有机客体的主体，其容量超过单个超分子笼子或容器的容量五个数量级，可与沸石，金属和金属制成。 ＃8211;基于体积的有机框架。通过在多金属氧酸盐保护的4＆＃8197;金纳米颗粒中添加己硫醇，在水中制备超球形。每个200nm的组件都在估计的27,400个金构件之间包含疏水孔，它们之间通过纳米级的孔相互连接。这提供了一个渗滤网络，可以有效地从水中吸收大量分子，包括600,000、2,100,000和2,600,000分子（35、190和234＆g8197; l ＆＃8722; 1 ）对二氯苯，双酚A和三硝基甲苯。

title: Nanomechanical mapping of first binding steps of a virus to animal cells
title_cn: 病毒与动物细胞结合的第一步的纳米力学作图
abstract: Viral infection is initiated when a virus binds to cell surface receptors. Because the cell membrane is dynamic and heterogeneous, imaging living cells and simultaneously quantifying the first viral binding events is difficult. Here, we show an atomic force and confocal microscopy set-up that allows the surface receptor landscape of cells to be imaged and the virus binding events within the first millisecond of contact with the cell to be mapped at high resolution (<50 nm). We present theoretical approaches to contour the free-energy landscape of early binding events between an engineered virus and cell surface receptors. We find that the first bond formed between the viral glycoprotein and its cognate cell surface receptor has relatively low lifetime and free energy, but this increases as additional bonds form rapidly (≤1 ms). The formation of additional bonds occurs with positive allosteric modulation and the three binding sites of the viral glycoprotein are quickly occupied. Our quantitative approach can be readily applied to study the binding of other viruses to animal cells.
abstract_cn: 当病毒结合到细胞表面受体上时，开始病毒感染。由于细胞膜是动态且异质的，因此很难对活细胞进行成像并同时量化第一个病毒结合事件。在这里，我们展示了一种原子力和共聚焦显微镜设置，该设置允许对细胞的表面受体景观进行成像，并且在与细胞接触的第一毫秒内的病毒结合事件将以高分辨率绘制（<50＆＃8197 ; nm）。我们提出了理论方法来勾勒出工程病毒和细胞表面受体之间早期结合事件的自由能态势。我们发现病毒糖蛋白与其同源细胞表面受体之间形成的第一个键具有相对较低的寿命和自由能，但是随着其他键的迅速形成而增加（＃8804; 1＆＃8197; ms）。附加键的形成以正的变构调节发生，并且病毒糖蛋白的三个结合位点被迅速占据。我们的定量方法可以很容易地应用于研究其他病毒与动物细胞的结合。

title: Society is part of the equation
title_cn: 社会是等式的一部分
